#Implementation


```html
<!--
	Very-useful html code
	-->
	<maps-location> </maps-location>
  <!--
  zoom is  optional, 15 is the default
  img , to set an image in your position optional
  drag, to make drawabble the marker with your position
  lattitude, as string
  longitude, as string
  title, the name of the marker
  -->
  <maps-location zoom="15", img="image.jpg", drag="true", 
  	lattitude="19.412138199999998", longitude="-99.18069129999999", 
  		title="red flag">
       </maps-location>
<!--
	More of your fine work
	-->
```
